localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
blogPost.body: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
blogPost.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups
blogPost.author: Murat Aksu

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的应用程序，可以根据人们的兴趣对他们进行微分组。如果你不是特别想要约会，但又不想结识一大群阻碍你真正了解他们的人，那你就来对地方了。
localize.tagline: 根据你在微群中的兴趣结识新朋友

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的應用程序，可以根據人們的興趣對他們進行微分組。如果你不是特別想要約會，但又不想結識一大羣阻礙你真正瞭解他們的人，那你就來對地方了。
localize.tagline: 根據你在微羣中的興趣結識新朋友

previous.title: Political twitter brings out the worst in just about everyone. Endless yelling and screaming, insults and ad-hominin attacks with zero intelligent discourse. Avoid it like the plague. Don't let them bring you down to their level.

localize.full_text: 政治推特几乎把每个人最坏的一面都带了出来。没完没了的叫喊和尖叫，侮辱和古人类攻击，没有任何智慧的话语。像躲避瘟疫一样避开它。别让他们把你带到他们的水平。
政治推特幾乎把每個人最壞的一面都帶了出來。沒完沒了的叫喊和尖叫，侮辱和古人類攻擊，沒有任何智慧的話語。像躲避瘟疫一樣避開它。別讓他們把你帶到他們的水平。
